dining.title: Enhance Your Dining Experience
dining.description: Enjoy seamless and convenient food ordering with our prepaid wallet system. Add funds, order with ease, and experience a new level of dining convenience.

features.exclusive: Exclusive for food orders across our locations
features.promotions: Special offers and promotions for wallet users

topup.title: Top Up Your Wallet
topup.description: Fill out the form below to add funds to your prepaid wallet
topup.success: Payment processed successfully! Your wallet has been credited.

q1.question: How do I use my prepaid wallet?
q1.answer: When placing an order, the system will automatically deduct the amount from your wallet balance.

q2.question: Is there an expiration date for my wallet balance?
q2.answer: No, your prepaid wallet balance does not expire and remains valid as long as your account is active.

q3.question: Can I transfer my balance to another account?
q3.answer: No, prepaid wallet balances are non-transferable between accounts. Each wallet is tied to a specific user account.

prepaidServiceMember.manageWalletSubtitle: Manage your prepaid wallet and track your spending
prepaidServiceMember.topUpDescription: Enter an amount below to add funds to your prepaid wallet
prepaidServiceMember.paymentSuccess: Payment processed successfully! Your wallet has been credited.
prepaidServiceMember.noPrepaidOrders: You haven't placed any prepaid orders yet.

hero.description: Enjoy a seamless dining experience with easy online ordering. Skip the wait and get your meals faster. Great food, just a click away!
loungeDescription: A welcoming space to gather, relax and enjoy time with friends.
aboutParagraph1: Campus Bites was founded by a group of students who were tired of waiting in long lines for food. We believe that students should be able to enjoy delicious, affordable meals without the wait.
aboutParagraph2: Our platform connects students with the best campus lounges and dining options. We've partnered with various food vendors across the campus to bring you a diverse range of culinary choices, from traditional Ethiopian dishes to international cuisines.
aboutParagraph3: With our easy-to-use platform, you can order ahead, skip the lines, and enjoy your meal wherever you want. We're committed to making your campus dining experience as seamless and enjoyable as possible.
